name: BubbleQuest
description:
Your submarine breaks down in the middle of the ocean, and you need to find the necessary resources to get your ship up and running again. Upgrade your gear and go searching for a way to fix your ride back home. Shoot bubbles to retrieve resources, but be careful: shooting bubbles also depletes your oxygen supply.

CONTROLS:

MovementWASDShoot BubblesArrow Keys

CREDITS:

Parallax Background: Underwater Fantasy Pixel Art Environment by Luis Zuno

Cave Tiles: Super Pixel Cave Tileset by Will Tice

Music: Art of Silence by uniq - Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)

This game was made for Mini Jam 84: Bubbles
